backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user registration with role-based access control (student/industryPartner/admin), user profile management, project CRUD operations, contact requests, and platform metrics using Map-based storage and AccessControl mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented authentication features including Internet Identity integration, role-based registration flow, protected routes, logout functionality, and role-based routing with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including styling, routing, dashboard pages, hooks for data fetching (profiles, projects, metrics, contacts), and authentication components with protected routes and role selection.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for a professional dark blue theme including sidebar, chart, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Bharat Silicon Setu application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component setting up TanStack Router with routes for landing, student/industry/admin dashboards, AI skill mapping, QueryClient provider, and conditional RoleSelectionModal for first-time authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Authentication guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to landing page and enforces role-based access by redirecting users to their correct dashboard based on their assigned role.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionMod: Modal dialog for first-time user registration capturing name, email, and role selection (Student/Industry Partner/Admin), then calling backend registerNewUser and redirecting to appropriate dashboard.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactRequests.ts: Provides hooks for fetching contact requests and sending new contact requests with automatic query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlatformMetrics.ts: Fetches platform-wide metrics (total users and projects) from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Provides hooks for fetching approved/user projects and saving projects with automatic cache invalidation.
Fetches user role and provides role-based dashboard path mapping for student, industry partner, and admin roles.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches the current user's profile from the backend actor with loading and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, accent, and sidebar color schemes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders an admin dashboard with sidebar navigation for overview, users, projects, analytics, and settings, displaying platform metrics and user profile information.
frontend/src/pages/AISkillMapping.tsx: Displays an AI-powered skill mapping interface where users can upload resumes to analyze semiconductor skills and get matched with relevant projects.
frontend/src/pages/IndustryDashboard.tsx: Industry dashboard component with sidebar navigation, project creation modal, and tabs for overview, projects, and applicants. Handles project creation with skills, authentication, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, navigation header, and authentication flow. Includes role-based redirect after login and links to stakeholder sections and AI skill mapping.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard with sidebar navigation for overview, projects, messages, profile, and settings tabs. Displays profile completion progress and message notifications with badge counts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support. Includes functions to store, retrieve, and clear parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with sidebar colors, custom fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk), and animation keyframes for accordions and fade-in effects.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking Bharat Silicon Setu, a semiconductor execution ecosystem SaaS platform with React + Tailwind CSS stack and dark blue professional theme. Contains 10 existing features including landing page, student dashboard, industry dashboard, and startup dashboard with sidebar navigation patterns.
